headline: A Childhood in Hospitals, an Adulthood in the Making
abstract: A genetic disorder has dominated large portions of Silas Wallerâ€™s life. Getting to college at first required a wheelchair and two buses, but he was determined to get on a path to financial security.
lead_paragraph: Silas Waller has measured his life in hospital stays. He has neurofibromatosis, a genetic disorder that causes tumors to form on nerve tissue. The condition makes it hard for him to walk.
keywords: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
